tɕe, nɤki, nɤ-khɯr pjɯ-ta-j ŋu tɕe nɯ ɣɯ-nɯ-mɟe ɲɯ-ra" to-ti. (250 tɤɣi, tɤɣe?) tɕendɤre @sunwukong kɯ ɲɤ-rga matɕi tɕe iɕqha "ɕɤxɕo aʑo, nɤki, tɯmɯ kɤrŋi tu-ɕe-a z-ɲɯ-ɤnɯɣro-a ra ntsɯ ku-sɯsam-a" ɲɤ-sɯso tɕe, tɕendɤre nɯra to-ti, tɕe tɕendɤre "aʑo kɯnɤ tɯmɯ kɤrŋi ɕɤxɕo ʑatsa tu-ɕe-a ra ku-sɯsam-a" to-ti tɕe tɕendɤre ɯ-zda ɣzɯ nɯra ɲɤ-βde tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ to-ndo, nɤki @jindouyun to-ndo tɕe tɕendɤre, nɯ ɯ-taʁ zɯ to-ɕe tɕe, @linxiaodian nɯtɕu jo-ʑɣɤsɤzɣɯt. tɕendɤre @yuhuangdadi kɯ nɯ @sunwukong, nɤkinɯ iɕqha, mbro kɯ-nɤpɯpa ju-sɯxɕe pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, (340) @sunwukong kɯ kɯki tɕhi kɯ-nɤma, @bimawen nɯ tɕhi ɯ-kɯ-nɤma ŋu nɯ mɯ-pjɤ-tso. tɕe "a-khɯr wuma kɯ-wxti ci pjɤ-ta ɲɯ-ŋu ɲɯ-sɯsɤm tɕe ɲɯ-rga. tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, nɯ ɯ-kɯ-nɤma jo-ɕe ri, nɤki, @bimawen nɯnɯ tɯmɯ kɤrŋi ra ɣɯ nɯ-mbro ɯ-kɯ-nɯkon kɯ-fse ci, ɯ-khɯr kɯ-xtɕɯ-xtɕi ci ɲɯ-ɕti ma, sna kɯ-tu pjɤ-maʁ wo. tɕe tɯ-sŋi tɕendɤre, ɯ-zda ra li, hanɯni /nɯŋgu/ nɯ-khɯr kɯ-tu nɯra cho, ra cha pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-tshi-nɯ-ci, tɕe pjɤ-rga-nɯ ʑo tɕe tɕe, @sunwukong nɯ kɯ to-thu: "ki @bimawen kɤ-ti nɯnɯ, ɯ-khɯr tɕhi jamar kɯ-wxti ci ŋu kɯ wo" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕeri ɯ-zda ra kɯ "kɯki, kɯki rcanɯ, maka kɤ-rtsɯz kɯ-me ci ʑo ɕti wo tɕe, nɤki, kɤ-rtsɯz kɯ-me ɣɯ ɯ-khɯr ci ɕti wo tɕe, nɤki, mbro kɤ-nɤpɯpa tɤ́-wɣ-sɯpa nɤ tɕendɤre "nɯnɯ pjɤ-tɯ-pe" tu-ti.
